[epcl_box type=“information”]é€Ÿåº¦å¿«çš„åŒå­¦ç›´æ¥å¤åˆ¶ä¸‹æ–¹çš„"å…¨éƒ¨æºç "è‡ªè¡Œç ”ç©¶! ç¨³ä¸€ç‚¹çš„åŒå­¦è¯·æŒ‰ç…§æ•™ç¨‹ä¸€æ­¥ä¸€æ­¥æ¥! [/epcl_box]

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

void main() => runApp(MyApp());

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      title: 'Awesome Border',
      theme: ThemeData(primarySwatch: Colors.blue),
      home: MyHomePage(title: 'My Awesome Border'),
    );
  }
}

class MyHomePage extends StatefulWidget {
  MyHomePage({Key key, this.title}) : super(key: key);
  final String title;

  @override
  _MyHomePageState createState() => _MyHomePageState();
}

class _MyHomePageState extends State {
  // å³å°†æ¸²æŸ“çš„è¾¹æ¡†ç»„ä»¶é›†åˆ
  List _borderWidgets;

  @override
  void initState() {
    // å¤„ç†å¸¦è¾¹æ¡†çš„å¯¹è±¡é›†åˆ
    _borderWidgets = [];
    super.initState();
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    // ä¸ºäº†ç¾è§‚, å°†å†…å®¹å…¨éƒ¨å±…ä¸­å¤„ç†
    _borderWidgets.forEach((element) {
      _borderWidgets[_borderWidgets.indexOf(element)] = Center(child: element);
    });

    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(title: Text(widget.title)),
      body: Center(
          child: Container(
        padding: EdgeInsets.all(20),
        child: GridView.count(
          padding: const EdgeInsets.all(8.0),
          crossAxisCount: 3,
          crossAxisSpacing: 5,
          mainAxisSpacing: 5,
          children: _borderWidgets,
        ),
      )),
    );
  }
}

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

void main() => runApp(MyApp());

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      title: 'Flutterå‰ªè´´æ¿æ“ä½œ',
      theme: ThemeData(
        primarySwatch: Colors.blue,
      ),
      home: MyHomePage(title: 'Flutterå‰ªè´´æ¿æ“ä½œ'),
    );
  }
}

class MyHomePage extends StatefulWidget {
  MyHomePage({Key key, this.title}) : super(key: key);
  final String title;

  @override
  _MyHomePageState createState() => _MyHomePageState();
}

class _MyHomePageState extends State {
  int _counter = 0;

  void _incrementCounter() {
    setState(() {
      _counter++;
    });
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text(widget.title),
      ),
      body: Center(
        child: Column(
          mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
          children: [
            Text(
              'You have pushed the button this many times:',
            ),
            Text(
              '$_counter',
              style: Theme.of(context).textTheme.headline4,
            ),
          ],
        ),
      ),
      floatingActionButton: FloatingActionButton(
        onPressed: _incrementCounter,
        tooltip: 'Increment',
        child: Icon(Icons.add),
      ),
    );
  }
}
